snippet: Valtteri Filppula scored twice in the final three minutes of regulation and then converted in the shootout to rally the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning past the Islanders, 3-2.
abstract: Tampa Bay Lightning beat New York Islanders, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Valtteri Filppula scored twice in the final three minutes of regulation and then converted in the shootout to rally the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning past the Islanders, 3-2.
